task.shortdesc: Install the Data Collector on the machine that you want to run a pipeline. After installation, you can launch the .

taskbody.context: installationservice startlaunch the Data Collectorservice startInstalling the as a service requires sudo privileges on the root directory.This procedure walks through setting the default directories, but you can alternatively use the libexec/sdcd-env.sh script.

step.cmd: Download the StreamSets SDC tarball and extract it to the desired location, typically /opt/local/.
Copy initd/_sdcinitd_prototype to the /etc/init.d/ directory as sdc.
Edit the sdc file and set the SDC_DIST environment variable to the location where you extracted the SDC tarball.
Use the following command to make the sdc file executable:
Create a system user and group to run the .
step.info: The default user and group are sdc/sdc.

step.cmd: Create the /etc/sdc directory and copy all files from etc into this directory.
Create the SDC log directory at /var/log/sdc and change the owner to sdc:sdc.
Create the SDC data directory at /var/run/sdc and change the owner to sdc:sdc.
